scripts.run_auspice_unix: AUSPICE_SERVICE_NAME=jobsservice AUSPICE_PROXY_PORT=8000 LOG4JS_CONFIG=./vistaprint_log4js.json AUSPICE_VERSION=0.2.0 AUSPICE_KEYSTORE=/var/vistaprint/auspice/ node .
scripts.run_auspice_win: AUSPICE_SERVICE_NAME=jobsservice AUSPICE_PROXY_PORT=8000 LOG4JS_CONFIG=vistaprint_log4js.json AUSPICE_VERSION=0.2.0 AUSPICE_KEYSTORE=c:\keystore\ node .
scripts.test_unix: AUSPICE_SERVICE_NAME=jobsservice AUSPICE_PROXY_PORT=8008 LOG4JS_CONFIG=./test/resources/test_log4js.json LOG4JS_DISABLE_LOGSTASH=true ./node_modules/mocha/bin/mocha -r jscoverage --covinject=true --coverage=50,85,90 --reporter spec -t 10000 test
scripts.test_win: SET AUSPICE_SERVICE_NAME=jobsservice&SET AUSPICE_PROXY_PORT=8008&SET LOG4JS_CONFIG=test\resources\test_log4js.json&SET LOG4JS_DISABLE_LOGSTASH=true& node .\node_modules\mocha\bin\mocha -r jscoverage --covinject=true --coverage=50,85,90 --reporter spec -t 10000 test
